directions.step:
1. PREPARE BACON ACCORDING TO DIRECTION ON RECIPE CARD NO. L00200 OR L00300.
2. COMBINE BACON AND CHEESE; ADD CHOPPED, CANNED PIMIENTO, SWEET PICKLE RELISH, AND SALAD DRESSING.
3. SPREAD 1 SLICE BREAD WITH 1/4 CUP (1-NO. 16 SCOOP) MIXTURE; TOP WITH SECOND SLICE OF DRESSING.
4. CUT EACH SAND WITH IN HALF; REFRIGERATE UNTIL READY TO SERVE.
Recipe Number: N00701
SERVING SIZE: 1 SANDWIC
